configuration
of a/r module Configure A/R
section.para: To configure the Accounts Receivable (A/R) module, select the "Configure A/R" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the A/R module, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: The next sequentially available Accounts Receivable Memo Number will display here. You may change the number--creating a new basis for the next A/R Memo Number--by typing the new number into this field.
Select if you want to hide the APPLY TO BALANCE button on the "Enter Cash Receipt" screen.
If this option is selected, users will be required to apply Cash Receipts manually to individual open A/R items.
Select if you want unapplied Cash Receipts from Customers to be handled by a Deferred Revenue Account.

If selected, the A/R Account Assignments screen will include a Deferred Revenue Account option. Not selecting this option will hide the Deferred Revenue Account option on the A/R Account assignments screen. Also hidden will be Customer Deposit options on the Cash Receipts screen. If the Deferred Revenue approach is not being used, then unapplied Cash Receipts will be handled by the Asset Account for the specified Bank Account.
The Remit-To Address is used in multiple report definitions. Specify details to be used for your site's default Remit-To Address:
Name: Specify the name to be used on the default Remit-To Address.
Address: Specify the address to be used on the default Remit-To Address.
Phone: Specify the phone number to be used on the default Remit-To Address.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Cancels any configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
Saves the configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
